fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose to organize a party for everyone to attend, and select a target's house to organize it at. 3 uses.
- Visit someone at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the night, all players will be notified a party will be going on at that player's house.
- All players will be obligated to go, unless they are jailed.
- At the end of the night, you will learn who arrived when, organized by people arriving after others. This is determined by how far that player's target was from the house the party is at.
Example: Party is at #3. #1 visits #2, #3 visits themself, #2 visits #1, #4 visits #2. The arrival order will be: #3, #1 **and** #4, #2.
